trans-unit.source: Exposes the items in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox" /> to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe os itens na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox" /> para Automação da Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" /> that is the parent of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorAutomationPeer" /> que é o pai deste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.
Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "ListBoxItem".

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, this method returns the current instance of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> for <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, esse método retornará a instância atual desse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo ou membro dá suporte à infraestrutura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e não se destina a ser usado diretamente do código.
